column2: "Heey, hello-ooo! It's Patty!"
"Hello, Tea here. Sorry for bothering you earlier."
"...I'm so, so sorry. I was worried we were getting stale, so I tried to spice things up, but it turned out to be a pretty dumb idea."
"Besides, that's not the Patty n' Tea you all know and love! So for now, we should just go back to how we started!"
"...What exactly do you mean by 'back to how we started'?"
"Firstly, we ARKS have to be on the lookout for Darkers!"
"We're going back that far!?"
"Now... Going-Back-To-The-Start Quiz!"
"Quiz!?"
"As you know, Tea and I are twin sisters, but which would you say is the elder sister, and which is the younger?!"
"1. Patty is the elder sister, Tea is the younger"
"2. Tea is the elder sister, Patty is the younger"
"Correct! I'm older, Tea's my little sister! You remembered that well!"
"I think it's a bit late to be asking questions like that, Patty."
"Bzzt! Wrong! I'm older, Tea's my little sister!"
"...You couldn't blame anyone for thinking that, Patty."
"Hmm, we were doing well, but something feels different..."
"...It feels like we're a long way from how we started."
"...Alright, next time we meet we'll start over properly, so look forward to it! Stay tuned!"
"Don't worry, next time we meet she'll have forgotten all about this."
